name: Take a bloody breather
description:
We live in a world where there's so much to do and so little time.

Like, it's a sham that they tell us that we can balance good grades, good work, good fashion sense, coolness and peace of mind at the same time. I can barely manage any of them at one time.

This guide is a lighthearted attempt to show how you can start to find and forcefully create a balance in your life, all adapted from the CBT solution of the 'worry map'. It has everything: inside jokes that'll go stale within the next hour; music; funny videos and a couple of tips and tricks that might potentially be helpful in the future!
